body:
hhhhhh one of my bnha ocs who controls fire 

(left: villain outfit, middle: school uniform, right: hero outfit)

she controls flames but can’t generate them so her gloves have little spark detonators so she can make flames when she needs to, oxygen mask and tank on her back (along w an emergency health kit), and earplugs, safety goggles, boots, and tool belt.

summary: Could you please write a fix with yandere villain Izuku falling for a yandere reader. The reader is a part if Izuku's crime...
question: Could you please write a fix with yandere villain Izuku falling for a yandere reader. The reader is a part if Izuku's crime group and likes flirting with people to make Izuku mad so he shows his "love" by killing who she flirted with.
answer:
You had to catch his attention in one way or another, didn’t you?

The only reason you joined the crime group was to get closer to Izuki. You weren’t sure the other members knew, and even if they did, you couldn’t care less. You merely had an eye for him, completing the tasks you were assigned, however vile they may be, to show him how far you were willing to go. But you couldn’t just outright state that you loved him- No, your goal had been to make him adore you in return. Because that way, you wouldn’t have to worry about him being swept away by someone else…

Though, if that were the case, you supposed you were willing to take some measures of your own.

Now with the endpoint in mind, your heart fluttered in your chest, even as your lips brushing against the stranger’s cheek left a rotten taste in your mouth. They stammered something, pink dusting their cheeks, but you didn’t bother listening. Ones new to the group were always much easier to mess with. Not to mention, they were still replaceable. You didn’t enjoy touching anyone besides your beloved in the slightest, still, it seemed it would be worth it this time. Because it seemed your goal was getting closer to completion.

Izuku’s glare was practically burning holes in your back, leaving the smirk spreading on your lips impossible to hide. You feigned innocence when a gloved hand secured its grip around your wrist. “Something wrong, boss?” His hold tightened enough to hurt, pulling you away from the one you had given some false affection and you felt like you might burst.

“You know what you did,” His tone was laced with barely hidden annoyance, a twitch moving the corner of his mouth. “And it isn’t the first time. I’d prefer if you didn’t do it again.” A shiver shot up your spine. You weren’t expecting him to seriously injure you, you were invaluable to the team, after all, and the alternative was a lot more appealing.

“And what if I do…?” Your quirk allowed you to loosen Izuku’s hold almost immediately and he grit his teeth, calling over the person you’d just been flirting with. Before that, you didn’t even know their name. Izuku whispered something to the newbie and you watched their eyes widen before smiling. Some bait, it seemed. You could hardly bite back your excitement.

You sat down for a couple of minutes, mindlessly observing the other people in the room, since you wanted to give Izuku a headstart with whatever he was planning. But it was hard to sit still. Eventually, you got up, fiddling with your sleeves as you followed the path your beloved had taken earlier.

Almost as soon as you left the more crowded area, the sounds of other’s voices fading into the background, wet gloves cupped your cheeks. Green eyes stared into yours and before he had the chance to mutter a word, you let your lips connect to his. You pulled away within a moment’s time, a smile tugging at your lips.

“You did it, right?… You hurt them for me-?” A smile looking a tad too wide for his features spread over his face, confirming your hope “I’m so happy…! I love you too!”

It seemed you two fed into each other’s worst habits, a bad basis for a relationship like no else, but you were completely fine with that.

blog.name: bakudekuwa
blog.title: bnha reactions, headcanons & scenarios!
blog.description: Welcome to my blog! On here I post reactions, headcanons and scenarios about my hero academia | requests are CLOSED! | please read the rules before sending a request | requests: 9

summary: To all fan fiction readers out there
body:
To all fan fiction readers out there

I understand sometimes you may forget to like a post, or reblog it or comment, but trust me when I say it means a lot to us writers when you do one of those things. Please remember all writers put a lot of effort in their work, and they’re sharing it on a website for free! I know some already are appreciative but I sometimes see people being mean to writers when they don’t even realise how much effort and passion it takes. So, to all writers who are reading this, I appreciate your work so so so much!!

Masterlist

FAQ Rules

summary: Can u do bakugous reaction to his gf's self harm scars or losing your virginity to bakugou but yoire super self conscious? Love...
question: Can u do bakugous reaction to his gf's self harm scars or losing your virginity to bakugou but yoire super self conscious? Love your blog!
answer:
Thank you for sending a request and I’m so happy that you love it❤️

I decided to go with the first one because I thought it could be really meaningful.


In Bakugou’s Apartement a charade of laughter can be heard.


One of your feet is pressed up against Bakugou’s chest, you laying on your back on the couch with him struggling on top of you. Both of your faces are displaying big grins as you playfully wrestle for power. “I could crush you shrimp.” He says and you roll your eyes.


You stretch your arms out to push his chest with that strength as well, not thinking about your sleeves falling down. Bakugou’s grin disappears and his face turns white as his eyes land on the scars on your arms. As soon as you see where his gaze is at you scramble to get out from underneath him, covering up your arms. Bakugou doesn’t resist anymore and sits next to you, frozen.

“Y/N, where did you get those?” He asks and a chill runs over your body at how calm his voice sounds. “I-I didn’t get them anywhere… I did it myself.” You say, not daring to look away from your clenched fists. An arm wraps around your shoulder and you feel a familiar warmth as Bakugou pulls you close. “Why did you do it?” He asks and you shake your head. “It was a long time ago Katsuki…” You say and you can feel how hard Bakugou’s heart is beating. “That’s not what I asked, but if you aren’t ready to tell me I’ll wait.”

You look at him in surprise now. Obviously you know that Bakugou can really be sweetheart, but you weren’t expecting so much patience and understanding.

Bakugou tries his best to hide his face under his hair but you notice that his eyes are a bit tearful. You hug him close to you and he wraps both his arms around you in return, nestling his face in your neck. “Just… If you ever feel that way again, I’m here. I’ll do my best to listen and understand.” He says you nod your head, feeling more secure in his arms than ever before.

In Bakugou’s Apartement a charade of laughter can be heard.


One of your feet is pressed up against Bakugou’s chest, you laying on your back on the couch with him struggling on top of you. Both of your faces are displaying big grins as you playfully wrestle for power. “I could crush you shrimp.” He says and you roll your eyes.


You stretch your arms out to push his chest with that strength as well, not thinking about your sleeves falling down. Bakugou’s grin disappears and his face turns white as his eyes land on the scars on your arms. As soon as you see where his gaze is at you scramble to get out from underneath him, covering up your arms. Bakugou doesn’t resist anymore and sits next to you, frozen.

“Y/N, where did you get those?” He asks and a chill runs over your body at how calm his voice sounds. “I-I didn’t get them anywhere… I did it myself.” You say, not daring to look away from your clenched fists. An arm wraps around your shoulder and you feel a familiar warmth as Bakugou pulls you close. “Why did you do it?” He asks and you shake your head. “It was a long time ago Katsuki…” You say and you can feel how hard Bakugou’s heart is beating. “That’s not what I asked, but if you aren’t ready to tell me I’ll wait.”

You look at him in surprise now. Obviously you know that Bakugou can really be sweetheart, but you weren’t expecting so much patience and understanding.

Bakugou tries his best to hide his face under his hair but you notice that his eyes are a bit tearful. You hug him close to you and he wraps both his arms around you in return, nestling his face in your neck. “Just… If you ever feel that way again, I’m here. I’ll do my best to listen and understand.” He says you nod your head, feeling more secure in his arms than ever before.

trail.content_raw:
Thank you for sending a request and I’m so happy that you love it❤️

I decided to go with the first one because I thought it could be really meaningful.

blog.name: bossssman
blog.title: DOODLE REQUESTS OPEN!
blog.description: Welcome to my BNHA art and writing dump. PS. I’ll doodle anything for fun! Just send them in! | Check my stuff at: BNHA my art | BNHA Drabbles | Pending List

summary: When it’s time to catch some zzz’s, it’d be on a Sunday like today. My, have you worked hard, sensei. You deserve the rest, for...
body:
Aizawa Sunday

When it’s time to catch some zzz’s, it’d be on a Sunday like today. My, have you worked hard, sensei. You deserve the rest, for tomorrow is another day.

More:

The day when he forgets his yellow sleeping bag, (and everyone knows that he needs his yellow sleeping bag), he reverts to opening a pack of cigarettes. As if his exhaustion can be carried away by the menthol smoke.

I was actually exploring different kinds of shading. Well, practice makes perfect.

Reblog if you likey~!

Follow for more BNHA crap. I take in doodle requests for now.
